body:
I was able to reproduce this locally with this stack trace:

Also, I got the windows firewall popup that seems to correspond to this message:
`E0324 12:49:07.782000000  9520 tcp_windows.c:311] WSASend error: An established connection was aborted by the software in your host machine.`

Interestingly enough, the popup shows up only for some of the runs (most of the time the tests passes).
